RTCSessionDescriptionRTCSessionDescripti.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The RTCSessionDescription() constructor creates a new
with its properties initialized as described in the
specified object.

blockquote.para:
Note: This constructor has been deprecated because
and other methods which take
SDP as input now directly accept an object conforming to the
RTCSessionDescriptionInit dictionary, so you don't have to instantiate an
RTCSessionDescription yourself.
